Uses of Package
sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events

  • Packages that use sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events 
    Package Description
    sx.blah.discord.api.internal
    This package contains all internal Discord4J apis.
    sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events
    This package contains all the events that Discord4J supports.
    sx.blah.discord.util
    This package contains utilities for dealing with the Discord api.
  • Classes in sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events used by sx.blah.discord.api.internal 
    Class and Description
    VoiceDisconnectedEvent.Reason
    This enum represents the possible reasons for discord being disconnected.
  • Classes in sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events used by sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events 
    Class and Description
    DisconnectedEvent
    This event is dispatched when either a shard loses connection to discord or is logged out.
    DisconnectedEvent.Reason
    This enum represents the possible reasons for discord being disconnected.
    DiscordDisconnectedEvent.Reason
    Deprecated. 
    Use DisconnectedEvent.Reason
    VoiceDisconnectedEvent.Reason
    This enum represents the possible reasons for discord being disconnected.
  • Classes in sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events used by sx.blah.discord.util 
    Class and Description
    ChannelDeleteEvent
    This event is dispatched when a channel is deleted.
    ChannelUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a channel's information is updated.
    GuildLeaveEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild is deleted or the bot is kicked.
    GuildTransferOwnershipEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild's ownership is transferred.
    GuildUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild is edited by its owner.
    MessageDeleteEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is deleted.
    MessageReceivedEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is received.
    MessageSendEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is sent by the bot.
    RoleUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a guild role is modified.
    UserRoleUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild updates a user's roles.
